distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for puppet fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2017-10689: Reset permissions when unpacking tar in PMT.
  When using minitar, files were unpacked with whatever permissions are in the tarball.
  This is potentially unsafe, as tarballs can be easily created with weird permissions
  (bsc#1080288)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: In previous versions of Puppet Agent it was possible to install a module with world writable permissions. Puppet Agent 5.3.4 and 1.10.10 included a fix to this vulnerability.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
